skill.name: Black Hole
skill.description:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Conjure a Black Hole at the target location that draws enemies to it and deals 360% weapon damage as Arcane over 2 seconds to all enemies within 15 yards.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Conjure a Black Hole that draws enemies to it and deals damage.

rune.name: Blazar
rune.description:
Conjure a Black Hole at the target location that draws enemies to it and deals 360% weapon damage as Fire over 2 seconds to all enemies within 15 yards.

After the Black Hole disappears, an explosion occurs that deals 464% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 15 yards.
rune.simpleDescription:
A fiery explosion occurs after the Black Hole disappears.

Black Hole's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Energy Twister
skill.description:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 1000% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything in its path.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Release a raging tornado that wreaks havoc across the battlefield.

rune.name: Gale Force
rune.description: Enemies hit by Energy Twister take 15% increased damage from Fire for 4 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Enemies hit by Energy Twister take increased damage from Fire.

skill.name: Archon
skill.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Transform into a being of pure arcane energy for 20 seconds. While in Archon form, your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities and your damage, Armor and resistances are increased by 20%.

Each enemy killed while in Archon form increases your damage by 6% for the remaining duration of Archon.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Become a being of pure energy and gain potent new abilities for 20 seconds.

rune.name: Improved Archon
rune.description: Increase the damage of all Archon abilities by 22%.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of all Archon abilities.

skill.name: Magic Weapon
skill.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Imbue your weapon with magical energy, granting it 10% increased damage. Lasts 10 minutes.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Imbue your weapon with magical energy, increasing your weapon's effectiveness.

rune.name: Ignite
rune.description: Attacks burn enemies, dealing 86% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.

skill.name: Teleport
skill.description:
Cooldown: 16 seconds

Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 50 yards away.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 16 seconds

Teleport instantly to another location.

rune.name: Fracture
rune.description: Summon 2 decoys for 8 seconds after teleporting.
rune.simpleDescription: Summon decoys of yourself after teleporting.

skill.name: Energy Armor
skill.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Focus your energies, increasing your Armor by 35% but decreasing your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 10 minutes.

Only one Armor may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Increase your Armor at the cost of decreasing your maximum Arcane Power while Energy Armor is active.

Only one Armor may be active at a time.

rune.name: Prismatic Armor
rune.description: Energy Armor also increases your resistance to all damage types 25%.
rune.simpleDescription: Energy Armor also increases your resistance to all damage types.

skill.name: Blur
skill.flavor: Truly powerful Wizards have been known to turn their magic inward, transmuting the very composition of their own bodies for boundless energy and catlike reflexes.

skill.name: Evocation
skill.flavor: So long have you focused on twisting reality to your will that time itself seeks to appease you.

skill.name: Unwavering Will
skill.description:
Standing still for 1.5 seconds increases the following attributes:

 Armor: 20%
 All Resistances: 20%
 Damage: 10%
skill.flavor: "At times the greatest strategy is to withdraw into yourself, to experience the clarity of mind in the moments before launching your attack." —Archmage Skye

skill.name: Conflagration
skill.description: Fire damage dealt to enemies applies a burning effect, increasing their chance to be critically hit by 6% for 3 seconds.
skill.flavor: "The red hot armor seared their flesh and boiled their blood as they tried desperately to pry it from smoldering bodies. We finished the defenseless creatures as an act of mercy." —Tales of Caldeum, Volume XII

skill.name: Intervene
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies within 10 yards of you for 3 seconds when you are hit.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies near you when you are hit.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 4952 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Guardian
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Rush to your aid, knocking back enemies within 15 yards and healing you for 140295 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

When your Life is low, the Templar will come to your aid, knocking back nearby enemies and healing you.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Missile Ward
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skill.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Disorient
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Cast a flash of light in an area, causing enemies to be disoriented for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Disorients enemies for a short time.

skill.name: Mass Control
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Lob a bulb of magical energy that hexes enemies in an area into chickens for 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Hexes a nearby group of enemies.
